text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump InsaAllah ❤❤
God has no partner🕋🇸🇦🕋 Muhammad is the Messenger of God❤
All that God does is for good❤
So only God can save us from this coronavirus❤ There is still time for all to repent to Allah. Have mercy on us on the occasion of Holy Ramadan🕋 https://t.co/0QJAppT1VE
